item.description: https://www.facebook.... Thursday.Time6:30am until 8:00am..Where Hudson, New Hampshire near Wal Mart, US 3A, ramp to Circumferential Highway, Hudson, NH Description Sign wave starts at 6:45 AM. This is the major intersection between the new Circumferential Highway and 3A. Nearby landmarks include the Hudson Walmart, the McDonald's across from WalMart, and the Haffner's gas station located at 215 Lowell Road, located about 2 blocks NO...RTH of the planned sign wave location. The best places to park are: The dead-end turnaround where Sagamore USED to intersect with Rt. 3A; the WalMart parking lot; the industrial center parking lot behind McDonald's. The temperature will be COLD 16 F, with bitter WNW winds of 15 MPH, will feel like 1 degree F. DRESS WARMLY. Bring Mittens or hand warmers if yo9 have them, and have protection for your ears. This is an exposed intersection so the wind will be brisk! Dress in Layers. Check out the EVENT PHOTO ON FACEBOOK for details on our planned location.
item.name: Nashua/Hudson Thursday Early Bird Sign Wave
